Deutsch: Jin shu (Eig, Werk, Autor: Fang Xuanling)
English: History of the Jin Dynasty, fifth of the 24 dynastic histories `二十四史~[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Fang Xuanling `房玄齡~|`房~`玄~龄[Fang2 Xuan2 ling2] in 648 during Tang Dynasty `唐朝~[Tang2 chao2], 130 scrolls
